name: Bin Shi Li Samsara's
description:
Cursor to block - WASD to move - F to dash

Based on the sokushinbutsu, You're a monk who is meditating to scape from the eternal cycle of life and death of the samsara, demons of the six realms try to interrupt you, use you Japa Mala to defend of his attacks! After a while the curses of the demons returns to themselves and free you of his oppresion
